merged_caption: This video captures a wide scenery shot focused on a vast desert environment. Initially, a white, weathered lighthouse with a dark-roofed lantern room is positioned slightly to the left of the center in the frame, occupying the foreground from a low-angle perspective. A bed of large, smooth rocks fills the bottom of the frame, while a clear, light-blue sky occupies the top background. The camera begins at a low angle, looking up at the structure, then executes a continuous upward and forward movement, panning slightly to the left and tilting downward. This motion transitions the view from a low angle to a high angle, revealing a vast, rocky desert landscape characterized by grayish-brown boulders, ridges, and a barren white terrain behind the lighthouse. As the camera rises, the view changes to reveal an expansive landscape of hazy, rolling desert mountains and pale sand dunes stretching to the horizon. The lighthouse remains in the foreground, still slightly left of center, occupying approximately three-quarters of the frame in height. Meanwhile, the visible sky at the top gradually diminishes, with the blue sky disappearing and leaving only a strip of white sky near the horizon. The entire scene is kept in sharp, deep focus, emphasizing the immense scale and desolate atmosphere of the environment. The lighthouse serves as a focal point that accentuates the vastness of the surrounding landscape, making the environment itself the primary subject.

5. Camera: Describes camera movements and framing choices

{captions}

6. When describing temporal changes, integrate motion and camera movements in chronological order to show how the scene evolves
7. CRITICAL: Every unique detail from all five captions must appear in the final merged caption - nothing should be omitted
8. Do NOT add any information not present in the original captions
9. Return only the merged caption without any additional text or formatting
